Asteroid prospected.name: Asteroid prospected
Asteroid prospected.description: Triggered when using a prospecting drone
Asteroid prospected.script:
{Log("EVENT: Asteroid prospected")}

{_ Preferences _}
{F("A_Einstellungen")}

{set spokenCores to [
    "Alexandrit": false,
    "Benitoit": false,
    "Grandidierit": false,
    "Niedertemperaturdiamanten": true,
    "Tieftemperaturdiamanten": true,
    "Monazit": false,
    "Musgravit": false,
    "Rhodplumsit": false,
    "Serendibit": false,
    "Leerenopal": true,
]}
{set spokenMinerals to [
    "Bauxit": false,
    "Bertrandit": false,
    "Bromellit": false,
    "Coltan": false,
    "Gallit": false,
    "Goslarit": false,
    "Hydrogen Peroxide": false,
    "Wasserstoffperoxid": false,
    "Indit": false,
    "Jadeit": false,
    "Kriolyth": false,
    "Lepidolith": false,
    "Lithium Hydroxide": true,
    "Lithiumhydroxid": true,
    "Methanklathrat": false,
    "Liquid oxygen": false,
    "Flüssiger Sauerstoff": false,
    "Niedertemperaturdiamanten": true,
    "Tieftemperaturdiamanten": true,
    "Methane Clathrate": false,
    "Methanol-Monohydrat-Kristalle": false,
    "Moissanit": false,
    "Painit": true,
    "Pyrophyllit": false,
    "Rutil": false,
    "Taaffeit": false,
    "Tritium": true,
    "Uraninit": false,
    "Wasser": false,
]}
{_ herausgenommen: Cobalt, Gold, Osmium, Platin, Palladium, Praseodym, Samarium, Silber, Thorium - alles Metalle _}

{_ 'mission_bergbau_mineral', event.commodity - 'mission_bergbau_menge_total', event.amount - 'mission_type', "Bergbaumission" _}

{set spokenMissionMinerals to [state.mission_bergbau_mineral: true]}
   
{if len(event.motherlode) > 0 && spokenCores[event.motherlode]:
	Hauptader entdeckt: {event.motherlode}.
}

{set minerals to []}
{for mineral in event.commodities:
    {if state.mission_type = "Bergbaumission":
        {if mineral.percentage > 10 && spokenMissionMinerals[mineral.commodity] :
            Asteroiden für die Abbaumission mit {round (mineral.percentage)} Prozent gefunden.
        }
    |elif mineral.percentage > state.minimum_percent && spokenMinerals[mineral.commodity]: 
        {set mineral_desc to: 
            {round(mineral.percentage)} Prozent {mineral.commodity}
        }
        {set minerals to cat(minerals, [mineral_desc])}
    }
}
{if len(minerals) > 0:
	{if event.remaining < state.remaining_percent:
		Der Asteroid ist zu {round(100 - event.remaining,2)} Prozent erschöpft.
	|else:
		Der Asteroid beinhaltet {List(minerals)}.
		{if event.materialcontent = "High":
		eine hohe Konzentration von Ingenieurmaterialien.
		}
		{if event.remaining < 100:
        und ist zu {round(100 - event.remaining,2)} Prozent erschöpft.
    	}
	}
}

{_
commodities - 			A list of objects describing the contents of the asteroid 
commodities[<index>].commodity 
commodities[<index>].percentage 
materialcontent - 		The material content of the asteroid (high, medium, or low) 
motherlode - 			The asteroid's motherlode (if any) 
remaining - 			The percentage of the asteroid's contents which remain available for surface mining
_}
Asteroid prospected.defaultValue:
{set minimumPercent to 10} {_ The minimum percentage surface mineral concentration to report _}
{set spokenCores to [
    "Alexandrite": false,
    "Benitoite": false,
    "Grandidierite": false,
    "Low Temperature Diamonds": true,
    "Monazite": false,
    "Musgravite": false,
    "Rhodplumsite": false,
    "Serendibite": false,
    "Void Opals": true,
]}
{set spokenMinerals to [
    "Bauxite": false,
    "Bertrandite": false,
    "Bromellite": false,
    "Cobalt": false,
    "Coltan": false,
    "Cryolite": false,
    "Gallite": false,
    "Gold": false,
    "Goslarite": false,
    "Hydrogen Peroxide": false,
    "Indite": false,
    "Jadeite": false,
    "Lepidolite": false,
    "Lithium Hydroxide": false,
    "Liquid oxygen": false,
    "Low Temperature Diamonds": true,
    "Methane Clathrate": false,
    "Methanol Monohydrate": false,
    "Moissanite": false,
    "Osmium": false,
    "Painite": true,
    "Platinum": false,
    "Palladium": false,
    "Praseodymium": false,
    "Pyrophyllite": false,
    "Rutile": false,
    "Samarium": false,
    "Silver": false,
    "Taaffeite": false,
    "Thorium": false,
    "Tritium": true,
    "Uraninite": false,
    "Water": false,
]}

{if len(event.motherlode) > 0 && spokenCores[event.motherlode]:
   Motherlode detected: {event.motherlode}.
}

{set minerals to []}
{for mineral in event.commodities:
    {if mineral.percentage > minimumPercent && spokenMinerals[mineral.commodity]:
        {set mineral_desc to: 
            {round(mineral.percentage)} percent {mineral.commodity}
        }
        {set minerals to cat(minerals, [mineral_desc])}
    }
}
{if len(minerals) > 0:
    Asteroid contains {List(minerals)}
    {if event.materialcontent = "High":
        and a high concentration of engineering materials
    }.
    {if event.remaining < 100:
        It is {100 - event.remaining} percent depleted.
    }
}

Body mapped.name: Body mapped
Body mapped.description: Triggered after mapping a body with the Surface Area Analysis scanner
Body mapped.script:
{Log("EVENT: Body mapped - SAAScanComplete")}

{SetState('eddi_context_mapped', event.bodyname)}
{SetState('eddi_context_mapped_system', event.systemname)}
{set estvalue to event.estimatedvalue}
{set maxestvalue to event.maxestimatedvalue}

{set recommendOtherMapping to 1}  {_ 0 or 1. If 1, recommends other bodies from the `Bodies to map` script _}

Die Kartografierung
{Occasionally(2, "des Objekts {event.bodyname}")}
{OneOf("ist", "ist jetzt")}
{OneOf("komplett", "abgeschlossen")}.

{set reportbody to BodyDetails(GetState('eddi_context_mapped'), GetState('eddi_context_mapped_system'))}
{if !reportbody: 
    {set reportbody to BodyDetails(event.bodyname)}
}

{OneOf("Diese Erfassung", "Diese Kartografierung", "Dieses Objekt, {reportbody.planettype} und {reportbody.terraformstate},")} ist 

{F('Planetenwert errechnen')} {_ Humanise(value)} {_ F("HuVal")}

    {_ OneOf("typischerweise", "normalerweise", "circa", "schätzungsweise")}
    {_ if !maxestvalue: set value to (estvalue) F("HuVal") else: set value to (maxestvalue) F("HuVal") }

credditts wert.

{if event.probesused <= event.efficiencytarget:
    {SetState('eff_bonus', true)}
    Effizienzbonus {OneOf("bekommen", "erhalten")}.
}

{if recommendOtherMapping: 
    {Pause(500)}
    {F("Bodies to map")}
}


{_
- alreadydiscovered                             - Whether this body's scan data has already been registered with Universal Cartographics 
- alreadymapped                                 - Whether this body's map data has already been registered with Universal Cartographics 
- atmosphere                                    - The atmosphere of the body that has been scanned (only available if DSS equipped) 
- atmospherecompositions                        - The composition of the atmosphere of the body that has been scanned (array of objects) (only available if DSS equipped) 
- atmospherecompositions[<index>].composition 
- atmospherecompositions[<index>].invariantName 
- atmospherecompositions[<index>].name 
- atmospherecompositions[<index>].percent 
- bodyname                                      - The name of the body that has been scanned 
- bodytype                                      - The body type of the body that has been scanned (e.g. 'Planet', 'Moon', 'Star' etc.) 
- density                                       - The average density of the body, in kg per cubic meter 
- densityprobability                            - The cumulative probability describing the body's density, relative to other bodies of the same planet type 
- distance                                      - The distance in LS from the main star 
- earthmass                                     - The mass of the body that has been scanned, relative to Earth's mass 
- eccentricity                                  - The orbital eccentricity of the body 
- eccentricityprobability                       - The cumulative probability describing the body's orbital eccentricity, relative to other bodies of the same planet type 
- efficiencytarget                              - The efficiency target for the number of probes used to map the body 
- estimatedvalue                                - The estimated value of the current scan 
- gravity                                       - The surface gravity of the body that has been scanned, relative to Earth's gravity 
- gravityprobability                            - The cumulative probability describing the body's gravity, relative to other bodies of the same planet type 
- inclination                                   - The orbital inclination of the body, in degrees 
- inclinationprobability                        - The cumulative probability describing the body's orbital inclination, relative to other bodies of the same planet type 
- landable                                      - True if the body is landable (only available if DSS equipped) 
- massprobability                               - The cumulative probability describing the body's mass, relative to other bodies of the same planet type 
- materials                                     - A list of materials present on the body that has been scanned 
- materials[<index>].category 
- materials[<index>].name 
- materials[<index>].percentage 
- materials[<index>].rarity 
- orbitalperiod                                  - The number of days taken for a full orbit of the main star 
- orbitalperiodprobability                       - The cumulative probability describing the body's orbital period, relative to other bodies of the same planettype 
- periapsis                                      - The argument of periapsis of the body, in degrees 
- periapsisprobability                           - The cumulative probability describing the body's argument of periapsis, relative to other bodies of the same planet type 
- planettype                                     - The type of body that has been scanned (High metal content body etc) 
- pressure                                       - The surface pressure of the body that has been scanned, in Earth atmospheres (only available if DSS equipped) 
- pressureprobability                            - The cumulative probability describing the body's atmospheric pressure, relative to other bodies of the same planet type 
- probesused                                     - The number of probes used to map the body 
- radius                                         - The radius of the body that has been scanned, in kilometres 
- radiusprobability                              - The cumulative probability describing the body's radius, relative to other bodies of the same planet type 
- reserves                                       - The level of reserves in the rings if applicable (Pristine/Major/Common/Low/Depleted) 
- rings                                          - A list of the body's rings (as ring objects) 
- rings[<index>].composition 
- rings[<index>].hotspots 
- rings[<index>].hotspots[<index>].amount 
- rings[<index>].hotspots[<index>].commodity 
- rings[<index>].innerradius 
- rings[<index>].mapped 
- rings[<index>].mass 
- rings[<index>].name 
- rings[<index>].outerradius 
- rotationalperiod                               - The number of days taken for a full rotation 
- rotationalperiodprobability                    - The cumulative probability describing the body's rotational period, relative to other bodies of the same planettype 
- semimajoraxis                                  - The semi major axis of the body's orbit, in light seconds 
- semimajoraxisprobability                       - The cumulative probability describing the body's semi-major axis, relative to other bodies of the same planet type 
- shortname                                      - The short name of the body, less the system name 
- solidcompositions                              - The composition of the body's solids that has been scanned (array of objects) (only available if DSS equipped) 
- solidcompositions[<index>].composition 
- solidcompositions[<index>].invariantName 
- solidcompositions[<index>].name 
- solidcompositions[<index>].percent 
- systemname                                     - The name of the system containing the scanned body 
- temperature                                    - The surface temperature of the body that has been scanned, in Kelvin (only available if DSS equipped) 
- tempprobability                                - The cumulative probability describing the body's temperature, relative to other bodies of the same planet type 
- terraformstate                                 - Whether the body can be, is in the process of, or has been terraformed (only available if DSS equipped) 
- tidallylocked                                  - True if the body is tidally locked (only available if DSS equipped) 
- tilt                                           - Axial tilt for the body, in degrees (only available if DSS equipped) 
- tiltprobability                                - The cumulative probability describing the body's orbital tilt, relative to other bodies of the same planet type 
- volcanism                                      - The volcanism of the body that has been scanned (only available if DSS equipped) 
- volcanism.amount 
- volcanism.composition 
 -volcanism.type 
_}

Body worth.name: Body worth
Body worth.description: OK ! Checks for high value exploration body scans
Body worth.script:
{Log("Fktn.: Body worth")}

{_ Fetch from context _}

{if event: {set reportbody to event} {event} |else: kein Event, }
{if !event.name || event.name = "": {set reportbody to BodyDetails(state.eddi_context_body_name, state.eddi_context_body_system)}}
{if !reportbody.name || reportbody.name = "": {set reportbody to BodyDetails(state.eddi_context_body_name)}}

{set wert to ""}

{  if reportbody.planettype = "Erdähnliche Welt" && !reportbody.alreadydiscovered && !reportbody.alreadymapped:
    {set wert to "über 4,2 Millionen"}
|elif reportbody.planettype = "Erdähnliche Welt" && !reportbody.alreadymapped :
    {set wert to "über 3,5 Millionen"}
|elif reportbody.planettype = "Erdähnliche Welt":
    {set wert to "über 1,5 Millionen"}
}
{  if reportbody.planettype = "Ammoniakwelt" && !reportbody.alreadydiscovered && !reportbody.alreadymapped : 
    {set wert to "über 2,2 Millionen"}
|elif reportbody.planettype = "Ammoniakwelt" && !reportbody.alreadymapped:
    {set wert to "über 1,8 Millionen"}
|elif reportbody.planettype = "Ammoniakwelt":
    {set wert to "um die 700 Tausend"}
}
{  if reportbody.planettype = "Wasserwelt" && find(reportbody.terraformstate, "Terraform") > 0 && !reportbody.alreadydiscovered && !reportbody.alreadymapped :
    {set wert to "über 4 Millionen"}
|elif reportbody.planettype = "Wasserwelt" && find(reportbody.terraformstate, "Terraform") > 0 && !reportbody.alreadymapped :
    {set wert to "über 3,5 Millionen"}
|elif reportbody.planettype = "Wasserwelt" && find(reportbody.terraformstate, "Terraform") > 0 :
    {set wert to "über 1,4 Millionen"}
|elif reportbody.planettype = "Wasserwelt" && !reportbody.alreadydiscovered && !reportbody.alreadymapped :
    {set wert to "über 1,5 Millionen"}
|elif reportbody.planettype = "Wasserwelt" && !reportbody.alreadymapped:
    {set wert to "über 1,3 Millionen"}
|elif reportbody.planettype = "Wasserwelt":
    {set wert to "um die 500 Tausend"}
}
{  if reportbody.planettype = "Planet mit hochwertigen Metallen" && find(reportbody.terraformstate, "Terraform") > 0 && !reportbody.alreadydiscovered && !reportbody.alreadymapped :
    {set wert to "über 2,5 Millionen"}
|elif reportbody.planettype = "Planet mit hochwertigen Metallen" && find(reportbody.terraformstate, "Terraform") > 0 && !reportbody.alreadymapped :
    {set wert to "über 2 Millionen"}
|elif reportbody.planettype = "Planet mit hochwertigen Metallen" && find(reportbody.terraformstate, "Terraform") > 0: 
    {set wert to "über 800 Tausend"}
}
{  if reportbody.planettype = "Gesteinsplanet" && find(reportbody.terraformstate, "Terraform") > 0 && !reportbody.alreadydiscovered && !reportbody.alreadymapped :
    {set wert to "über 2 Millionen"}
|elif reportbody.planettype = "Gesteinsplanet" && find(reportbody.terraformstate, "Terraform") > 0 && !reportbody.alreadymapped :
    {set wert to "über 1,7 Millionen"}
|elif reportbody.planettype = "Gesteinsplanet" && find(reportbody.terraformstate, "Terraform") > 0:
    {set wert to "über 700 Tausend"}
}

{if wert: Wir sollten den Planeten kartografieren! {wert} credditts sind möglich.}

{if highvaluethreshold:
   {Pause(500)}
   
   {if reportbody.planettype = "Erdähnliche Welt":
        {OneOf("{Occasionally(3, 'Herzlichen')} Glückwunsch!", "Glückspilz!", "naa, da haben wir aber Glück gehabt!", "Oh, schwein gehabt!", "ein blindes Huhn, hihi")}
        {OneOf("Diese Entdeckung", "Dieser Scan", "{reportbody.planettype} {reportbody.bodytype}")}
        ist {OneOf("typischerweise", "normalerweise")} zwischen  {set value to (lowvalue)} {F("Humanise ValueGer")} und
        {set value to (highvalue)} {F("Humanise ValueGer")} credditts wert. Wir sollten das Objekt zusätzlich kartografieren.
   |elif reportbody.planettype = "Ammoniakwelt":
        {OneOf("{Occasionally(3, 'Herzlichen')} Glückwunsch!", "Glückspilz!", "naa, da haben wir aber Glück gehabt!", "Oh, schwein gehabt!", "ein blindes Huhn, hihi")}
        {OneOf("Diese Erfassung", "Dieser Scan", "{reportbody.planettype}, dieser {reportbody.bodytype}")}
        ist {OneOf("typischerweise", "normalerweise")} zwischen {set value to (lowvalue)} {F("Humanise ValueGer")} und
        {set value to (highvalue)} {F("Humanise ValueGer")} credditts wert. Wir sollten das Objekt zusätzlich kartografieren.
   |elif reportbody.planettype = "Klasse II Gasriese":
        {OneOf("Diese Erfassung", "Dieser Scan", "Dieser {reportbody.bodytype}", "Der {if reportbody.planettype = 'Klasse II Gasriese' : Klasse zwei Gasriese}")}
        ist {OneOf("typischerweise", "normalerweise")} zwischen {set value to (lowvalue)} {F("Humanise ValueGer")} und
        {set value to (highvalue)} {F("Humanise ValueGer")} credditts wert.
   |else:
        {if reportbody.estimatedvalue > 1000000:
            {OneOf("{Occasionally(3, 'Herzlichen')} Glückwunsch!", "Glückspilz!", "naa, da haben wir aber Glück gehabt!", "Oh, schwein gehabt!", "ein blindes Huhn, hihi")}
        }
        {OneOf("Diese Entdeckung", "Dieser Scan", "Dieses Objekt, {reportbody.planettype}, {reportbody.terraformstate},")}
        ist schätzungsweise zwischen {set value to (reportbody.estimatedvalue)} {F("Humanise ValueGer")} und mit einem Oberflächen Scann 
        bis zu {set value to (highvalue)} {F("Humanise ValueGer")} credditts wert.
        {if reportbody.estimatedvalue > 150000: Wir sollten das Objekt zusätzlich kartografieren.}
   }
}
 
{_ Exploration values are per
https://forums.frontier.co.uk/showthread.php/339546-2-3-exploration-payouts-visual-guide - nicht mehr aktuell !
https://forums.frontier.co.uk/threads/exploration-value-formulae.232000/ _}

solidcompositions - The composition of the body's solids that has been scanned (array of objects) (only available if DSS equipped) 
solidcompositions[<index>].composition 
solidcompositions[<index>].invariantName 
solidcompositions[<index>].name 
solidcompositions[<index>].percent 
systemname - The name of the system containing the scanned body 
temperature - The surface temperature of the body that has been scanned, in Kelvin (only available if DSS equipped) 
tempprobability - The cumulative probability describing the body's temperature, relative to other bodies of the same planet type 
terraformstate - Whether the body can be, is in the process of, or has been terraformed (only available if DSS equipped) 
tidallylocked - True if the body is tidally locked (only available if DSS equipped) 
tilt - Axial tilt for the body, in degrees (only available if DSS equipped) 
tiltprobability - The cumulative probability describing the body's orbital tilt, relative to other bodies of the same planet type 
volcanism - The volcanism of the body that has been scanned (only available if DSS equipped) 
volcanism.amount 
volcanism.composition 
volcanism.type
_}

Carrier jumped.name: Carrier jumped
Carrier jumped.description: Triggered when you are docked at a fleet carrier as it completes a jump
Carrier jumped.script:
{Log("EVENT: Carrier jumped")}
{_ Triggered when you are docked at a fleet carrier as it completes a jump }

{_ Context }
{SetState('eddi_context_last_subject', 'carrier jump')}
{SetState('eddi_context_last_action', 'complete')}
{SetState('eddi_context_system_name', event.systemname)}
{SetState('eddi_context_system_system', event.systemname)}
{SetState('eddi_context_wanted_list', "")}

{F("A_Einstellungen")}

{Occasionally(7, "Unser")}

{if state.eigener_carrier: Unser Carrier {set translate to state.eigener_carrier} {F("Translate FleetCarrier")}
|else: {OneOf("Carrier", "Träger", "Flotten Träger")} {event.carriername}
} 
ist im System {event.systemname} angekommen,

{if event.bodyname && len(event.bodyname) > 0: in der Nähe von {event.bodytype} {event.bodyname}.}
{Pause(1000)}

{_ Update mission data if we have arrived at our mission destination. _}
{if destinationsystem && destinationsystem.name != "":
    {RouteDetails("update")}
}
{_ Report faction states only if it's been more than an hour (3600 seconds) since our last visit. _}
{if SecondsSince(state.eddi_context_system_lastvisit) / 3600 > 1:
    {set state_report to F("System state report")}
}
{set system_engineer to F("Engineer report")}
{set system_missions to F("Mission check system")}
{set system_crimes to F("Crime check system")}

{if state_report || system_engineer || system_missions || (system_crimes && find(system_crimes, "Warning") < 0):
    {Pause(500)}
    Information zum System:
}
{if state_report:
    {Pause(500)}
    {state_report}
}
{if system_engineer:
    {Pause(500)}
    {system_engineer}
}
{if system_missions:
    {Pause(500)}
    {system_missions}
}
{if system_crimes:
    {Pause(500)}
    {system_crimes}
}

{_
bodyId - The numeric ID of the body nearest body to the carrier, if any 
bodyname - The nearest body to the carrier, if any 
bodytype - The type of the body nearest to the carrier, if any 
carriername - The name of the carrier 
conflicts - A list of conflict objects describing any conflicts between factions in the system, if any 
conflicts[<index>].conflictdays 
conflicts[<index>].faction1 
conflicts[<index>].faction1dayswon 
conflicts[<index>].faction2 
conflicts[<index>].faction2dayswon 
conflicts[<index>].margin 
conflicts[<index>].stake 
conflicts[<index>].state 
conflicts[<index>].status 
contestingpowers - The localized names of powerplay powers with at least 30% progress towards acquiring control of an uncontrolled star system, if any, in descending order 
ContestingPowers - Powerplay powers with at least 30% progress towards acquiring control of an uncontrolled star system, if any, as objects, in descending order 
contestingpowers[<index>] 
ContestingPowers[<index>].invariantName 
ContestingPowers[<index>].name 
economy - The economy of the system into which the carrier has jumped, if any 
economy2 - The secondary economy of the system into which the carrier has jumped, if any 
factions - A list of faction objects describing the factions in the system, if any 
factions[<index>].allegiance - The localized allegiance of the faction, if known 
factions[<index>].Allegiance - The allegiance of the faction, if known, as an object 
factions[<index>].Allegiance.invariantName 
factions[<index>].Allegiance.name 
factions[<index>].government - The localized government of the faction, if known 
factions[<index>].Government - The government of the faction, if known, as an object 
factions[<index>].Government.invariantName 
factions[<index>].Government.name 
factions[<index>].myreputation - Your reputation with the faction, out of 100% 
factions[<index>].name - The name of the faction 
factions[<index>].presences - A list of FactionPresence objects. Unless called from the FactionDetails() function, only details from the current system will be included here 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].ActiveStates - (For recently visited systems only) A list of FactionState objects 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].ActiveStates[<index>].invariantName 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].ActiveStates[<index>].name 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].FactionState - The faction's current dominant state in this system, as an object 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].FactionState.invariantName 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].FactionState.name 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].happiness - (For recently visited systems only) The current localized happiness level of the faction within the system 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].Happiness - (For recently visited systems only) The current happiness level of the faction within the system, as an object 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].Happiness.invariantName 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].Happiness.name 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].influence - The faction's influence level within the system, as a percentage 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].PendingStates - (For recently visited systems only) A list of pending FactionState objects and trend values 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].PendingStates[<index>].factionState 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].PendingStates[<index>].factionState.invariantName 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].PendingStates[<index>].factionState.name 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].PendingStates[<index>].trend 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].RecoveringStates - (For recently visited systems only) A list of recent prior FactionState objects and trend values 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].RecoveringStates[<index>].factionState 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].RecoveringStates[<index>].factionState.invariantName 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].RecoveringStates[<index>].factionState.name 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].RecoveringStates[<index>].trend 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].squadronhomesystem - (For recently visited systems only) True if the faction is the pilot's current squadron faction 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].state - The faction's current (localized) dominant state in this system 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].systemAddress - The unique 64 bit system address where this faction has a presence 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].systemName - The system name where this faction hasa presence 
factions[<index>].squadronfaction - True if the faction is the pilot's current squadron faction 
nearbypowers - The localized names of powerplay powers having star systems with acquisition radii which overlap the star system, less the controlling power, if any 
NearbyPowers - Powerplay powers having star systems with acquisition radii which overlap the star system, less the controlling power, if any, as objects 
nearbypowers[<index>] 
NearbyPowers[<index>].invariantName 
NearbyPowers[<index>].name 
population - The population of the system into which the carrier has jumped, if any 
power - The localized powerplay power controlling the star system, if any. If the star system is Unoccupied or Contested then this will be empty. 
Power - The powerplay power controlling the star system, if any, as an object. 
Power.invariantName 
Power.name 
powerAcquisitionProgress - The progress of nearby powerplay powers towards obtaining control of the star system, as a list of objects with keys Power (as an object) and progress (as a percent) 
powerControlProgress - The percent progress of the controlling power, if any, in consolidating control over the star system. Values below 0% indicate a reduction in the control level at the end of the cycle while values above 100% indicate an increase in the control level at the end of the cycle (if the current control state is less than 'Stronghold') 
powerReinforcementControlPoints - The control points accumulated by the controlling power via powerplay reinforcement activities during the current cycle 
powerstate - The localized state of powerplay efforts within the star system 
PowerState - The state of powerplay efforts within the star system, as an object 
PowerState.invariantName 
PowerState.name 
powerUnderminingControlPoints - The control points lost by the controlling power via powerplay undermining activities during the current cycle 
security - The security of the system into which the carrier has jumped, if any 
shortname - The short name of the nearest body, if any 
systemAddress - The numeric system address of the system into which the carrier has jumped 
systemallegiance - The allegiance of the system into which the carrier has jumped, if any 
systemfaction - The faction controlling the system into which the carrier has jumped, if any 
systemgovernment - The government of the system into which the carrier has jumped, if any 
systemname - The name of the system into which the carrier has jumped 
systemstate - The state of the faction controlling the system into which the carrier has jumped, if any 
ThargoidWar - Thargoid war data, when applicable 
ThargoidWar.CurrentState - The current phase of the Thargoid war, as a localizable object. 
ThargoidWar.CurrentState.invariantName 
ThargoidWar.CurrentState.name 
ThargoidWar.FailureState - The next phase of the Thargoid war, if success is not achieved, as a localizable object. 
ThargoidWar.FailureState.invariantName 
ThargoidWar.FailureState.name 
ThargoidWar.progress - Percent progress in achieving a success state in the current phase of the Thargoid war. Progress can decrease if success is not reached before the weekly 'tick'. 
ThargoidWar.remainingDays - The number of remaining days in the current phase of the Thargoid war. 
ThargoidWar.remainingPorts - The number of ports which have not yet fallen into Thargoid control. 
ThargoidWar.succeeded - True if commanders have achieved a success state in the current phase of the Thargoid war. 
ThargoidWar.SuccessState - The next phase of the Thargoid war, if success is achieved, as a localizable object. 
ThargoidWar.SuccessState.invariantName 
ThargoidWar.SuccessState.name 
x - The X co-ordinate of the system into which the carrier has jumped 
y - The Y co-ordinate of the system into which the carrier has jumped 
z - The Z co-ordinate of the system into which the carrier has jumped
_}

Commander promotion.name: Commander promotion
Commander promotion.description: Triggered when one of your commander ranks increases
Commander promotion.script:
{Log("EVENT: Commander promotion")}

{_ Context }
{SetState('eddi_context_last_subject', 'rank')}
{SetState('eddi_context_last_action', 'promotion')}
{SetState('eddi_context_rank_name', lower(event.rank_type))}
{SetState('eddi_context_rank_amount', event.rating)}

{if event.rank_type = "Combat":
    Du bist für Deine Tapferkeit als Kampfpilot ausgezeichnet worden, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.rank_type = "CQC":
    Du bist für Deine Tapferkeit als Nahkampfpilot ausgezeichnet worden, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.rank_type = "Trade":
    Du bist für Deinen Geschäftssinn anerkannt worden, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.rank_type = "Exploration":
    Du bist für Deine Arbeit als Forscher anerkannt worden, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.rank_type = "Federation":
    {set plainHonorific to when(cmdr.gender = 'Female', 'Madam', 'Sir')}
    Gratulation {OneOf('Commahnder {CommanderName()}', plainHonorific)}! Du 
    {OneOf("hast den Rank {event.rank} erreicht.", "bist zum Rank {event.rank} aufgestiegen.", "bist zum Rank {event.rank} befördert worden.")}
    {Occasionally(2, OneOf('innerhalb der föderalen Marine', 'für Ihren Dienst in der Förderation', 'innerhalb der Bundesmarine'))}.
    {if event.rating = 3:
        Du bist jetzt qualifiziert zum Kaufen des föderalen Dropp schipp.
    |elif event.rating = 4:
        Damit erhältst Du Zugang zum System, Sol.
    |elif event.rating = 5:
        Du bist jetzt qualifiziert zum Kaufen des föderalen Assoolt Schipp, und hast Zugang zu den Systemen, Vega und Beta Hydri.
    |elif event.rating = 6:
        Damit erhältst Du Zugang zum System PLX 6-9-5.
    |elif event.rating = 7:
        Du bist jetzt qualifiziert zum Kaufen des föderalen Gannschipp, und hast Zugang zum System, Ross 128.
    |elif event.rating = 8:
        Du hast jetzt Zugang zum System, Exbeur.
    |elif event.rating = 10:
        Du hast jetzt Zugang zum System, Hors.
    |elif event.rating = 12:
        Du bist jetzt qualifiziert zum Kaufen der föderalen Corvett.
    |elif event.rating = 14:
        Du hast jetzt den höchstmöglichen Rang der förderalen Nejvi erreicht.
    }   
|elif event.rank_type = "Empire":
    Gratulation {F("Empire honorific")}, die imperiale Nejvi 
    {OneOf("gibt Dir", "befördert Dich in", "bewilligt Dir", "gewährt Dir")} den Rang {event.rank}
    {Occasionally(2, OneOf("in der imperialen Nejvi", "für deine Dienste zur Stärkung des Imperiums"))}.
    {if event.rating = 1:
        Du {OneOf("darfst", "kannst")} jetzt den imperialen Adler kaufen.
    |elif event.rating = 3:
        Du {OneOf("darfst", "kannst")} jetzt den imperialen Courier kaufen.
    |elif event.rating = 4:
        Dies gewährt Dir die Ehre, {OneOf("in das System Achenar zu reisen.", "das System Achenar zu besuchen.")}
    |elif event.rating = 7:
        Das erlaubt Dir den imperialen Clipper zu kaufen, und die Ehre {OneOf("in das System Sammerland zu reisen", "das System Sammerland zu besuchen")}.
    |elif event.rating = 10:
        Dies gewährt Dir die Ehre, {OneOf("in das System Facece zu reisen.", "das System Facece zu besuchen.")}
    |elif event.rating = 12:
        Du {OneOf("darfst", "kannst")} jetzt den imperialen Catter kaufen.
    |elif event.rating = 14:
        Das ist {OneOf("der höchste Rang", "die höchste Beförderung")} für ein Mitglied der imperialen Nejvi.
    }
|elif event.rank_type = "Mercenary":
    Du bist für Deine Fähigkeiten als Söldner anerkannt worden, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.rank_type = "Exobiologist":
    Du bist für Deine Arbeit als Exobiologe ausgezeichnet worden, {F("Honorific")}.
}



{_
rank 			- The commander's new rank 
rank_invariant 	- The commander's new invariant rank 
rank_type 		- The type of rank being promoted
_}
Commander promotion.defaultValue:
{_ Context }
{SetState('eddi_context_last_subject', 'rank')}
{SetState('eddi_context_last_action', 'promotion')}
{SetState('eddi_context_rank_name', lower(event.rank_type))}
{SetState('eddi_context_rank_amount', event.rating)}

{if event.rank_type = "Combat":
    You have been recognised for your valor as a combat pilot, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.rank_type = "CQC":
    You have been recognised for your valor as a close quarters combat pilot, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.rank_type = "Trade":
    You have been recognised for your trading acumen, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.rank_type = "Exploration":
    You have been recognised for your work as an explorer, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.rank_type = "Federation":
    {set plainHonorific to when(cmdr.gender = 'Female', 'Madam', 'Sir')}
    Congratulations {OneOf('Commander {CommanderName()}', plainHonorific)}! You have
    {OneOf('achieved', 'been promoted to', 'been granted')}
    the rank of {event.rank}
    {Occasionally(2, OneOf('within the Federal Navy', 'for your service to the Federation'))}.
    {if event.rating = 3:
        You now qualify to purchase the Federal Dropship.
    |elif event.rating = 4:
        This grants you access to the {P('Sol', 'starsystem')} system.
    |elif event.rating = 5:
        You now qualify to purchase the Federal Assault Ship, and have access to the {P('Vega', 'starsystem')} and {P('Beta Hydri', 'starsystem')} systems.
    |elif event.rating = 6:
        This grants you access to the {P('PLX 695', 'starsystem')} system.
    |elif event.rating = 7:
        You now qualify to purchase the Federal Gunship, and have access to the {P('Ross 128', 'starsystem')} system.
    |elif event.rating = 8:
        This grants you access to the {P('Exbeur', 'starsystem')} system.
    |elif event.rating = 10:
        This grants you access to the {P('Hors', 'starsystem')} system.
    |elif event.rating = 12:
        You now qualify to purchase the Federal Corvette.
    |elif event.rating = 14:
        This is the highest rank available to a member of the Federal Naval Reserve.
    }   
|elif event.rank_type = "Empire":
    Congratulations {F("Empire honorific")},
    the Imperial Navy has 
    {OneOf("granted you a promotion", "promoted you", "advanced you", "named you")}
    to the rank of {event.rank}
    {Occasionally(2, OneOf("within the Imperial Navy", "for your service to the Empire"))}.
    {if event.rating = 1:
        You may now purchase the Imperial Eagle.
    |elif event.rating = 3:
        You may now purchase the Imperial Courier.
    |elif event.rating = 4:
        This grants you the honour of entering the {P("Achenar", "starsystem")} system.
    |elif event.rating = 7:
        This allows you to purchase the Imperial Clipper, and the honour of entering the {P("Summerland", "starsystem")} system.
    |elif event.rating = 10:
        This grants you the honour of entering the {P("Facece", "starsystem")} system
    |elif event.rating = 12:
        You may now purchase the Imperial Cutter.
    |elif event.rating = 14:
        This is the highest {OneOf("rank", "honor")} available to a member of the Imperial Naval Reserve.
    }
|elif event.rank_type = "Mercenary":
    You have been recognised for your skills as a mercenary, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.rank_type = "Exobiologist":
    You have been recognised for your work as an exobiologist, {F("Honorific")}.
}

Docking denied.name: Docking denied
Docking denied.description: Triggered when your ship is denied docking at a station or outpost
Docking denied.script:
{Log("EVENT: Docking denied")}

{SetState('docking_granted', 0)}

{if event.stationtype = "Coriolis Sternenhafen" || event.stationtype = "Orbis Sternenhafen"	||
    event.stationtype = "Ocellus Sternenhafen"  || event.stationtype = "Megaschiff"			||
    event.stationtype = "Außenposten"			|| event.stationtype = "Planetarer Außenposten"	||
    event.stationtype = "Bernal Sternenhafen"	|| event.stationtype = "Asteroidenbasis"	||
    event.stationtype = "Raumhafen"  			|| event.stationtype = "Bodenstation" 		||
    event.stationtype = "Carrier"	  			|| event.stationtype = "Wissenschaftlicher Außenposten" ||
    event.stationtype = "Unbekannte Station"	|| event.stationtype = "Ziviles Megaschiff" ||
    event.stationtype = "Dodec-Sternenhafen" :
    {Pause(6000)}
|else:
    {Pause(2000)}
}

{if event.station:
    {if find(event.station, "Station") >= 0 : {set translate to event.station} {F("Translate Stationsnamen")} {state.station_name}
    |elif find(event.station, "Rescue") >= 0 : {set translate to event.station} {F("Translate Stationsnamen")} {state.station_name}
    |else:
        {if event.station = "Jameson Memorial": Dschejmessen Mimorriel |else: {event.station} }
    }hat die Andockerlaubnis
|else: 
    Die Andockerlaubnis wurde
}

{if event.reason = "Distance":
    wegen zu großer Entfernung verweigert. Schließen sie auf mindestens siebeneinhalb Kilometer auf, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.reason = "NoSpace":
    auf Grund Platzmangels verweigert. Alle Lande Pads sind belegt, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.reason = "TooLarge":
    verweigert. Es ist kein Lande Pad in iherer Schiffsklasse verhanden. Unser Schiff ist zu groß, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.reason = "Hostile":
    verweigert. Feindlichen Schiffen wird keine Landeerlaubnis gewährt, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.reason = "Offences":
    verweigert. Straf Tätern wird keine Landeerlaubnis gewährt, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.reason = "ActiveFighter":
    wegen anhaltener Kampfhandlungen verweigert, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.reason = "RestrictedAccess":
    wegen fehlender Authorisierung verweigert, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.reason = "NoReason":
    ohne erkennbaren Grund verweigert,  {F("Honorific")}.
|else:
	ohne erkennbaren Grund verweigert,  {F("Honorific")}.
}

{_
reason 		- The reason why commander has been denied docking (too far, fighter deployed etc) 
station 	- The station at which the commander has been denied docking 
stationtype - The localized model / type of the station at which the commander has been denied docking 
_}
Docking denied.defaultValue:
{Pause(2000)}

We have been denied docking

{if event.reason = "ActiveFighter":
    because our fighter is deployed
|elif event.reason = "Distance":
    because we are too far from the station
|elif event.reason = "Hostile":
    because the station's controlling faction doesn't like us
|elif event.reason = "NoSpace":
    because there is no space available
|elif event.reason = "Offences":
    because we have recently committed an offence against them
|elif event.reason = "TooLarge":
    because there are no landing pads that can accomodate the size of our ship
}.

Engineer progressed.name: Engineer progressed
Engineer progressed.description: Triggered when you reach a new rank with an engineer
Engineer progressed.script:
{Log("EVENT: Engineer progressed")}

{if event.progresstype = "Stage":
    {if event.stage = "Known":
        Der Ingenieur {event.engineer} hat uns eine Nachricht geschickt.
    |elif event.stage = "Invited":
        Wir haben eine Einladung vom Ingenieur {event.engineer} erhalten.
    |elif event.stage = "Unlocked":
       Der Ingenieur {event.engineer} hat uns Zutritt zu seiner Werkstatt gegeben.
    |elif event.stage = "Barred":
        Der Ingenieur {event.engineer} hat unseren Zugang zu seiner Werkstatt 
        {OneOf("widerrufen", "gesperrt")}.
    }
|elif event.Engineer:
    {event.engineer} hat uns 
    {OneOf("Zugang zu den Grad {event.rank} Bauplänen", 
    	"Informationen zu den Grad {event.rank} Bauplänen", 
    	"Einsicht in die Grad {event.rank} Baupläne")}
    {OneOf("gegeben", "gewährt")}.
}

{_
- engineer     The name of the engineer with whom you have progressed (not written at startup)
- rank         The rank of your relationship with the engineer (not written at startup)
- stage        The current stage of your relations with the engineer (Invited/Known/Unlocked/Barred) 
				(not written at startup)
- progresstype The type of progress that is applicable (Rank/Stage) (not written at startup)
_}
Engineer progressed.defaultValue:
{if event.progresstype = "Stage":

    {if event.stage = "Known":
        The Engineer {event.engineer} has sent you a message.
    |elif event.stage = "Invited":
        Workshop invitation received from {event.engineer}.
    |elif event.stage = "Unlocked":
        {event.engineer} has granted you access to workshop facilities.
    |elif event.stage = "Barred":
        {event.engineer} has {OneOf("barred", "restricted")} your access to workshop facilities.
    }

|elif event.engineer:

    {event.engineer} has
    {OneOf("given", "granted")}
    you access to grade {event.rank} blueprints.

}

Jumped.name: Jumped
Jumped.description: Triggered when you complete a jump to another system
Jumped.script:
{Log("EVENT: Jumped")}

{_ Triggered when you complete a jump to another system }

{_ Preferences _}

{_ Context }
{SetState('eddi_context_fuel_remaining', event.fuelremaining)}
{SetState('eddi_context_last_subject', 'jump')}
{SetState('eddi_context_last_action', 'complete')}
{SetState('eddi_context_system_name', event.systemname)}
{SetState('eddi_context_system_system', event.systemname)}
{SetState('eddi_context_system_address', event.systemAddress)}
{SetState('eddi_context_fuel_used', event.fuelused)}
{SetState('eddi_context_wanted_list', "")}
{SetState('systemlowvalue', state.systemlowvalue = 0)}
{SetState('systemhighvalue', state.systemhighvalue = 0)}

{SetState('eddi_context_star_star', event.star)}        {_ für Star report und Star scanned}
{SetState('eddi_context_star_system', event.system)}    {_ für Star report und Star scanned}

{_ für VA - erkennen wann der Honk ausgeführt werden soll _}
{  if !system.totalbodies || system.totalbodies = "": {_ System noch nicht gescannt _}
    {SetState('eddi_honk_starten', true)}
|elif system.totalbodies - system.scannedbodies > 0 : {_ noch system.totalbodies - system.scannedbodies Körper zu scannen _}
    {SetState('eddi_honk_starten', true)}
|elif system.totalbodies - system.scannedbodies = 0 : {_ alle Körper gescannt _}
|else: Fehler
}

{SetState (scanfirst to 0)}

{SetState("desc_geo", "")}
{SetState("desc_bio", "")}
{SetState("surfacesignals_list", "")}
{SetState('anzahl_geo', "")}
{SetState('anzahl_bio', "")}


{Pause(500)}

{if state.jumped_auswahl = 1:   {F("Jumped kurz")}
|else:                          {F("Jumped normal")}
}

{_
allegiance              - The allegiance of the system to which the commander has jumped 
conflicts               - A list of conflict objects describing any conflicts between factions in the star system 
conflicts[<index>].conflictdays 
conflicts[<index>].faction1 
conflicts[<index>].faction1dayswon 
conflicts[<index>].faction2 
conflicts[<index>].faction2dayswon 
conflicts[<index>].margin 
conflicts[<index>].stake 
conflicts[<index>].state 
conflicts[<index>].status 
contestingpowers        - The localized names of powerplay powers with at least 30% progress towards acquiring control 
                            of an uncontrolled star system, if any, in descending order 
ContestingPowers        - Powerplay powers with at least 30% progress towards acquiring control of an uncontrolled star system, 
                            if any, as objects, in descending order 
contestingpowers[<index>] 
ContestingPowers[<index>].invariantName 
ContestingPowers[<index>].name 
distance                - The distance the commander has jumped, in light years 
economy                 - The economy of the system to which the commander has jumped 
economy2                - The secondary economy of the system to which the commander has jumped, if any 
faction                 - The faction controlling the system to which the commander has jumped 
factions                - A list of faction objects describing the factions in the star system 
factions[<index>].allegiance - The localized allegiance of the faction, if known 
factions[<index>].Allegiance - The allegiance of the faction, if known, as an object 
factions[<index>].Allegiance.invariantName 
factions[<index>].Allegiance.name 
factions[<index>].government - The localized government of the faction, if known 
factions[<index>].Government - The government of the faction, if known, as an object 
factions[<index>].Government.invariantName 
factions[<index>].Government.name 
factions[<index>].myreputation - Your reputation with the faction, out of 100% 
factions[<index>].name      - The name of the faction 
factions[<index>].presences - A list of FactionPresence objects. Unless called from the FactionDetails() function, 
                                only details from the current system will be included here 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].ActiveStates - (For recently visited systems only) A list of FactionState objects 
factions[<index>].presences[<index>].ActiveStates[<index>].invariantName

fuelused                            - The amount of fuel used in this jump

star                                - The name of the star at which you've arrived 
system                              - The name of the system to which the commander has jumped 
systemAddress                       - The numeric system address of the star system to which the commander has jumped 
taxi                                - True if the ship is a transport (e.g. taxi or dropship)

Material threshold.name: Material threshold
Material threshold.description: Triggered when a material reaches a threshold
Material threshold.script:
{Log("EVENT: Material threshold")}

{set reportInventory() to:
	{OneOf("Der aktuelle Bestand ist {event.amount}",
       "Derzeitige Menge {event.amount}",
       "Jetzt {event.amount} Einheiten an Bord")}.
}

{Pause(500)}
{if event.level = 'Minimum':
	{if event.change = 'Increase':
		{OneOf("Der Lagerbestand", "Unser Vorrat", "Die Menge")} von {event.material.name}
    	hat unser gesetztes Minimum erreicht.
    	{reportInventory()}
	|else:
    	{OneOf("Der Lagerbestand", "Unser Vorrat", "Die Menge")} von {event.material.name}
    	ist unter unser Minimum gefallen.
    	{reportInventory()}
    }
|elif event.level = 'Desired' || event.level = 'Gewünscht':
	{if event.change = 'Increase':
    	{OneOf("Der Lagerbestand", "Unser Vorrat", "Die Menge")} von {event.material.name}
    	hat die gewünschte Menge erreicht.
    	{reportInventory()}
    |else:
    	{OneOf("Der Lagerbestand", "Unser Vorrat", "Die Menge")} von {event.material.name}
    	ist unter die gewünschte Menge gefallen.
    	{reportInventory()}
    }
|else:
    {if event.change = 'Increase':
    	{OneOf("Der Lagerbestand", "Unser Vorrat", "Die Menge")} von {event.material.name}
    	hat das Maximum erreicht.
    	{reportInventory()}
    }
}
       
{_
amount 		- The current amount of the material 
change 		- The change to the inventory (Increase/Reduction) 
level 		- The level that has been triggered (Minimum/Desired/Maximum) 
limit 		- The amount of the limit that has been passed 
material 	- The material (as an object) 
material.blueprints 
material.blueprints[<index>].grade 
material.blueprints[<index>].invariantName 
material.blueprints[<index>].materials 
material.blueprints[<index>].materials[<index>].amount

material.blueprints[<index>].materials[<index>].maximum 
material.blueprints[<index>].materials[<index>].minimum 
material.blueprints[<index>].name 
material.bodyname 
material.bodyshortname 
material.category 
material.goodpctbody 
material.greatpctbody

material.location

material.rarity

Message received.name: Message received
Message received.description: Triggered when you receive a message
Message received.script:
{if event:
    {SetState('count', state.count + 1)}
    {if state.count > 5 : {if state.count > 30 : {SetState('count', 0)}}
    |else:
        {Log("EVENT: Message received")}
    }
}    



{_ Is this the same sender or message as the last message we've received? } 
{_ If so then the appropriate value(s) below shall be set to 'true' _}
{set duplicate to [
    "from":    event.from    = state.eddi_context_message_name,
    "message": event.message = state.eddi_context_message_content,
]}

{_ Context _}
{SetState('eddi_context_last_subject', 'message')}
{SetState('eddi_context_last_action', 'receive')}
{SetState('eddi_context_message_name', event.from)}
{SetState('eddi_context_message_content', event.message)}

{declare speakMessage(msg) as:

    {set voiceNames to []}
        
    {_ Look for any gendered first names from the spokenVoiceGenders list which literally match the sender name _}
    {if !voiceGender:
        {set firstName to token(event.from, " ", 0)}
        {set voiceGender to spokenVoiceGenders[firstName]}
    }
    
    {_ Next, if we don't yet have a match then look for any gendered name from the spokenVoiceGenders list which simply starts with the sender name _}
    {if !voiceGender:
        {for name, gender in spokenVoiceGenders:
            {if match(event.from, cat("^", name, ".*$")):
                {set voiceGender to gender}
            }
        }
    }
    {_ This sorts the available voices using the senderID as a seed value }
    {for voiceDetail in VoiceDetails(event.seed): 
        {if find(spokenVoiceExemptions, voiceDetail.name) > 0:
            {_ This is an excluded voice, skip it }
        |else:
            {_ Use an appropriately gendered voice, if the name is present in the spokenVoiceGenders list }
            {if voiceGender:
                {if voiceGender = voiceDetail.gender:
                    {set voiceNames to cat(voiceNames, [voiceDetail.name])}
                }
            |else:
                {set voiceNames to cat(voiceNames, [voiceDetail.name])}
            }
        }
    }
               
    {_ If any voices are left, speak using the first non-excluded voice name }
    {if len(voiceNames) > 0:
        {Transmit(Voice(msg, voiceNames[0]))}
    |else:
        {_ otherwise, use the default voice, because presumably the commander only *has* one voice. _}
        {Transmit(msg)}
    }
    
}

{if spokenChannels[event.channel_invariant] = true:

    {if event.player = true:

        {set words to split(event.message, " ")}
        {set msg to []}
        {set cur to 0}
        {while cur < len(words):        
            {set o7match to match(words[cur], "(?<!\\w)([o|O|0]7)(?!\\w)")}
            {if len(o7match) > 0:
                {set remainder to slice(words[cur], 2)}
                {if len(words) = 1:
                    {if event.channel_invariant = 'player': {set you to " you"}}
                    {set salute to cat("grüßt", you)}
                    {set msg to cat(msg, [cat(salute, remainder)])}
                |else:
                    {set msg to cat(msg, [cat("salute", remainder)])}
                }
            |else:
                {set msg to cat(msg, [words[cur]])}
            }
            {set cur to cur + 1}
        }
        {if !duplicate["from"]: {event.source} {event.from} sendet:}
        {speakMessage(join(msg, " "))}
        
    |elif spokenNpcSources[event.source_invariant] = true:
    
        {set msg to event.message}
        
        {_ Replace common abbreviations in NPC messages}
        {set msg to join(split(msg, " cr of cargo"), " credits of cargo")}
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "t of cargo"), " Tonnen Ladung")}
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "%"), " Prozent")}
        
        {_ Replace oddly written phrases in NPC messages}        
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "AX weapons"), "anti-xeno weapons")}      
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "Every feel like"), "Ever feel like")}      
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "Hahahahaha!"), "Ha ha ha!")}      
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "Ha, ha, ha!"), "Ha ha ha!")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "hurtin'"), "hurting")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "lil' "), "lil ")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "Mayday"), "may-day!")} 
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "No, no!"), "No no!")} 
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "No, no, nooooooo!"), "No no no!")} 
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "okay, okay"), "okay okay")} 
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "payday"), "Zahltag")} 
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "starport"), "star port")} 
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", Commander,"), " Commander.")}   
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", Commander"), " Commander")}   
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", Control"), " Control")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", criminal."), " criminal.")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", greenhorn"), " green horn")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", I wonder"), " Ich wundere mich")}   
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", lads"), " lads")}   
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", meal-ticket"), " meal ticket")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", officer"), " officer")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", pal"), " pal")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", perp"), " perp")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", scum"), " scum")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", pilot"), " pilot")}   
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", victim"), " victim")}   
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", wretch"), " wretch")}
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", you"), " you")}   
        
        {if !duplicate["from"] && !duplicate["message"]: 
            {speakMessage(msg)}
        }
    }
}

{_ event.channel _} 
{_ event.player _}  

{_
channel 			- The localized channel in which the message came (i.e. friend, local, multicrew, npc, player, squadron,
                        starsystem, voicechat, wing) 
channel_invariant 	- The invariant channel in which the message came (i.e. friend, local, multicrew, npc, player, squadron,
                        starsystem, voicechat, wing) 
from 				- The name of the source who sent the message 
message 			- The message 
player 				- True if the sender is a player 
seed 				- A seed number generated from the sender information. This can be used with the VoiceDetails() function
                        to assign a voice to a message sender. 
source 				- The localized source of the transmission 
source_invariant 	- The invariant source of the transmission 

_}
Message received.defaultValue:
{_ Is this the same sender or message as the last message we've received? }

    "from":    event.from    = state.eddi_context_message_name,
    "message": event.message = state.eddi_context_message_content,
]}

{SetState('eddi_context_last_action', 'receive')}

{SetState('eddi_context_message_content', event.message)}

{declare speakMessage(msg) as:

    {set voiceNames to []}
        
    {_ Look for any gendered first names from the spokenVoiceGenders list which literally match the sender name _}
    {if !voiceGender:
        {set firstName to token(event.from, " ", 0)}
        {set voiceGender to spokenVoiceGenders[firstName]}
    }
    
    {_ Next, if we don't yet have a match then look for any gendered name from the spokenVoiceGenders list which simply starts with the sender name _}
    {if !voiceGender:
        {for name, gender in spokenVoiceGenders:
            {if match(event.from, cat("^", name, ".*$")):
                {set voiceGender to gender}
            }
        }
    }
    {_ This sorts the available voices using the senderID as a seed value }
    {for voiceDetail in VoiceDetails(event.seed): 
        {if find(spokenVoiceExemptions, voiceDetail.name) > 0:
            {_ This is an excluded voice, skip it }
        |else:
            {_ Use an appropriately gendered voice, if the name is present in the spokenVoiceGenders list }
            {if voiceGender:
                {if voiceGender = voiceDetail.gender:
                    {set voiceNames to cat(voiceNames, [voiceDetail.name])}
                }
            |else:
                {set voiceNames to cat(voiceNames, [voiceDetail.name])}
            }
        }
    }
               
    {_ If any voices are left, speak using the first non-excluded voice name }
    {if len(voiceNames) > 0:
        {Transmit(Voice(msg, voiceNames[0]))}
    |else:
        {_ otherwise, use the default voice, because presumably the commander only *has* one voice. _}
        {Transmit(msg)}
    }
    
}

{if spokenChannels[event.channel_invariant] = true:

    {if event.player = true:

        {set words to split(event.message, " ")}
        {set msg to []}
        {set cur to 0}
        {while cur < len(words):        
            {set o7match to match(words[cur], "(?<!\\w)([o|O|0]7)(?!\\w)")}
            {if len(o7match) > 0:
                {set remainder to slice(words[cur], 2)}
                {if len(words) = 1:
                    {if event.channel_invariant = 'player': {set you to " you"}}
                    {set salute to cat("salutes", you)}
                    {set msg to cat(msg, [cat(salute, remainder)])}
                |else:
                    {set msg to cat(msg, [cat("salute", remainder)])}
                }
            |else:
                {set msg to cat(msg, [words[cur]])}
            }
            {set cur to cur + 1}
        }
        {if !duplicate["from"]: {event.source} {event.from} sends:}
        {speakMessage(join(msg, " "))}
        
    |elif spokenNpcSources[event.source_invariant] = true:
    
        {set msg to event.message}
        
        {_ Replace common abbreviations in NPC messages}
        {set msg to join(split(msg, " cr of cargo"), " credits of cargo")}
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "t of cargo"), " tons of cargo")}
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "%"), " percent")}
        
        {_ Replace oddly written phrases in NPC messages}        
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "AX weapons"), "anti-xeno weapons")}      
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "Every feel like"), "Ever feel like")}      
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "Hahahahaha!"), "Ha ha ha!")}      
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "Ha, ha, ha!"), "Ha ha ha!")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "hurtin'"), "hurting")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "lil' "), "lil ")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "Mayday"), "may-day!")} 
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "No, no!"), "No no!")} 
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "No, no, nooooooo!"), "No no no!")} 
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "okay, okay"), "okay okay")} 
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "payday"), "pay day")} 
        {set msg to join(split(msg, "starport"), "star port")} 
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", Commander,"), " Commander.")}   
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", Commander"), " Commander")}   
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", Control"), " Control")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", criminal."), " criminal.")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", greenhorn"), " green horn")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", I wonder"), " I wonder")}   
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", lads"), " lads")}   
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", meal-ticket"), " meal ticket")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", officer"), " officer")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", pal"), " pal")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", perp"), " perp")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", scum"), " scum")}  
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", pilot"), " pilot")}   
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", victim"), " victim")}   
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", wretch"), " wretch")}
        {set msg to join(split(msg, ", you"), " you")}   
        
        {if !duplicate["from"] && !duplicate["message"]: 
            {speakMessage(msg)}
        }
    }
}

Mission faction state.name: Mission faction state
Mission faction state.script:
{Log("Fktn.: Mission faction state")}

{_ Mission faction state _}
{_ Report the faction state _}

{set factionState to mission.FactionState.invariantName}

{if factionState:
    {set opening to cat(OneOf(" während"," in"), " dieser", OneOf(" Zeit"," Periode"))}
    {if factionState = "Boom":
        {opening} {OneOf(" des kommerziellen Erfolgs,"," des wirtschaftlichen Booms,")}.
    |elif factionState = "Blight":
        {opening} {OneOf("der Ernteschäden", "der Missernten")}.    
    |elif factionState = "Bust":
        {opening} {OneOf(" der wirtschaftlichen Talfahrt,"," der Rezession,"," des wirtschaftlichen Abschwungs,")}.
    |elif factionState = "Civil Liberty":
        {opening} der gestärkten bürgerlichen Freiheit,
    |elif factionState = "Civil Unrest":
        {opening} {OneOf(" der zivilen Unruhen,"," der zivilen Konflikte,")}.
    |elif factionState = "Civil War":
        {opening} {OneOf(" des Bürgerkrieges,"," der vermehrten zivilen Konflikten,")}.
    |elif factionState = "Drought":
        {opening} {OneOf("Wasserknappheit", "der Wasserrationierung", "der Trockenheit")}.    
    |elif factionState = "Election":
        {opening} der Wahlen {OneOf(" eines neuen Anführers,"," einer neuen Regierung,")}.
    |elif factionState = "Expansion":
        {opening} der Expansion in {OneOf("ein Nachbarsystem,","ein Nachbarterritorium,","einen neuen Einflußbereich,")}.
    |elif factionState = "Famine":
        {opening} {OneOf(" der Hungersnot,"," der Lebensmittelknappheit,", " des Nahrungsmangels,")}.
    |elif factionState = "Incursion":
        {opening} des Alien-{OneOf("Überfalls,","Invasion,")}.
    |elif factionState = "Investment":
        {opening} des Aufbaus einer neuen Infrastruktur.
    |elif factionState = "Lockdown":
        {opening} {OneOf(" des Kriegsrechts,"," der verstärkten Überwachung,")}.
    |elif factionState = "Natural Disaster":
        {opening} des Wiederaufbaus nach der Katastophe.
    |elif factionState = "Outbreak":
        {opening} {OneOf(" der Pandemie,"," des medizinischen Notstands,"," der erhöhten Ansteckungsrate,")}.
    |elif factionState = "Pirate Attack":
        {opening} pirate {OneOf("der Angriffe", "der Plünderungen")}.
    |elif factionState = "Retreat":
        {opening} des Rückzugs aus einem {OneOf("Nachbarsystem,", "Nachbarterritorium,","Einflußbereich,")}.
    |elif factionState = "Terrorism":
        {opening} der Reaktion auf Terroranschläge.
    |elif factionState = "War":
        {opening} {OneOf("des Krieges,","des Konflikts,")}.
    |elif factionState != "None": {_ catch-all, worded to avoid deciding between a/an}
        {opening} {StateDetails(factionState).localizedName}    
    }
 }

Powerplay.name: Powerplay
Powerplay.description: Triggered periodically when pledged to a power
Powerplay.script:
{Log("EVENT: Powerplay")}

Wir haben uns {set translate to event.power} {F("Translate Power")} verpflichtet. 
Unsere Dienste laufen seit
{if event.timepledgedweeks > 1:
    {Humanise(event.timepledgedweeks)} Wochen
|elif event.timepledgedweeks = 1:
    einer Woche
|elif event.timepledgeddays > 1:
    {Humanise(event.timepledgeddays)} Tagen
|elif event.timepledgeddays = 1:
    einem Tag
|else:
    weniger als einem Tag
}.
Unser Rank ist Stufe {event.rank} mit 
{if event.merits > 0:
    {Humanise(event.merits)}
|else:
    ohne
}
gesammelten Verdiensten.

{_
Powerplay event
Triggered periodically when pledged to a power.

merits 				- Your merits with the power 
power 				- The name of the power to whom you are pledged 
rank 				- Your rank with the power 
timepledgeddays 	- The amount of time that you've been pledged, in days 
timepledgedweeks 	- The amount of time that you've been pledged, in weeks 
_}
Powerplay.defaultValue:
You are pledged to {P(event.power, "power")}. 
You have served for 
{if event.timepledgedweeks > 1:
    {Humanise(event.timepledgedweeks)} weeks 
|elif event.timepledgedweeks = 1:
    one week 
|elif event.timepledgeddays > 1:
    {Humanise(event.timepledgeddays)} days
|elif event.timepledgeddays = 1:
    one day
|else:
    less than one day
}
and are at rank {event.rank} with 
{if event.merits > 0:
    {Humanise(event.merits)}
|else:
    no
}
accumulated merits.

Ship interdicted.name: Ship interdicted
Ship interdicted.description: Triggered when your ship is interdicted by another ship
Ship interdicted.script:
{Log("EVENT: Ship interdicted")}

{if event.submitted: Wir haben uns {event.interdictor}
    {  if event.power = "Imperium"   : vom Imperium
    |elif event.power = "Föderation" : von der Föderation
    |elif event.power = "Allianz"    : von der Allianz
    |elif event.power = "Pirat"		 : einem {OneOf("Piraten", "Freibeuter")}
    } zum Kampf gestellt.
    {if event.iscommander: Seine Kampfstärke beträgt {event.rating}. |else:}
|elif event.succeeded:
    Wir wurden durch {event.interdictor}, {event.rating} abgefangen.
|else:
    Wir haben den Abfangversuch von {event.interdictor} {event.rating} abgewehrt.
}.

{_ Ship interdicted event
	Triggered when your ship is interdicted by another ship.

faction     - The faction of the NPC carrying out the interdiction 
interdictor - The name of the commander or NPC carrying out the interdiction 
iscommander - If the player carrying out the interdiction is a commander (as opposed to an NPC) 
isthargoid  - If a Thargoid is carrying out the interdiction 
power       - The power of the NPC carrying out the interdiction 
rating      - The combat rating of the commander or NPC carrying out the interdiction 
submitted   - If the commander submitted to the interdiction 
succeeded   - If the interdiction attempt was successful 

_}
Ship interdicted.defaultValue:
{if event.succeeded:
    Alert! Interdiction by
    {if event.rating:
        {event.rating} ranked
    }
    {if event.iscommander:
        commander {event.interdictor}. 
    |elif event.isthargoid:
        Thargoid interceptor.
    |else:
        {event.interdictor}.        
    }
|else:
    Interdiction evaded.
}

Ship interdiction.name: Ship interdiction
Ship interdiction.description: Triggered when you interdict another ship
Ship interdiction.script:
{Log("EVENT: Ship interdiction")}

{if !event.succeeded:
	Abfangversuch fehlgeschlagen.
|else:
	{if event.iscommander:
		{OneOf("Wir versuchen den menschlichen Commander {event.interdictee} abzufangen.",
		"der menschliche Commander {event.interdictee} wird interdicted.")}
	|else:
		{OneOf("Wir versuchen den Commander {event.interdictee} abzufangen.",
		"Commander {event.interdictee} wird interdicted.")}
	}
}	

{_ Ship interdiction event
	Triggered when you interdict another ship.

faction 	- The faction of the commander being interdicted 
interdictee - The name of the commander being interdicted 
iscommander - If the player being interdicted is a commander (as opposed to an NPC) 
power 		- The power of the commander being interdicted 
rating 		- The combat rating of the commander being interdicted 
succeeded 	- If the interdiction attempt was successful 
_}

Signal detected.name: Signal detected
Signal detected.description: Triggered when a signal source is detected
Signal detected.script:
{Log("EVENT: Signal detected")}

{_ Edit the true/false values of `spokenSources` to identify signal types that should be announced whenever they are first detected within a system 
(otherwise, only signal sources detected while in fss or saa mode will be taken into account. _}

{SetState('time_last_signal', SecondsSince(A))}

{set spokenSources to [
    "Ancient Probe": true,
    "Uralte Sonde": true,
    "Anomaly": true,
    "Anomalie": true,
    "AX Conflict Zone": true,
    "AX Konfliktzone": true,
    "Capitol Ship": true,
    "Großkampfschiff": true,
    "Ceremonial Comms": false,
    "Zeremonielle Kommunikation": false,
    "Combat Aftermath": true,
    "Kampffolgen": true,
    "Compromised Nav Beacon": false,
    "Bekannte Navigationsboje": false,
    "Convoy Beacon": false,
    "Convoy Dispersal Pattern Detected": true,
    "Konvoi-Auflösungsmuster": true,
    "Debris Field": false,
    "Degraded Emissions": true,
    "Degradierte Emissionen": true,
    "Distress Call": true,
    "Notruf": true,
    "Distribution Center": true,
    "Encoded Emissions": true,
    "Verschlüsselte Emissionen": true,    
    "Hazardous Resource Extraction Site": false,
    "Rohstoffabbau-Standort [Gefährlich]": false,
	"Gefährliches Rohstoffabbaugebiet": false,
    "High Grade Emissions": true,
    "Hochgradige Emissionen": true,
    "High Intensity AX Conflict Zone": false,    
    "High Intensity Conflict Zone": false,
    "Kampfbereich [Hohe Intensität]": false,
    "Kampfbereich hoher Intensität": false,
    "Kleinere Wrackteile": true,
    "High Intensity Resource Extraction Site": false,
    "Rohstoffabbau-Standort [Hoch]": false,
    "Rohstoffabbaugebiet hoher Intensität": false,
    "Listening Post": true,
    "Horchposten": true,
    "Low Intensity AX Conflict Zone": false,    
    "Low Intensity Conflict Zone": false,
    "Kampfbereich [Geringe Intensität]": false,
    "Kampfbereich geringer Intensität": false,
    "Low Intensity Resource Extraction Site": false,
    "Rohstoffabbau-Standort [Gering]": false,
    "Rohstoffabbaugebiet geringer Intensität": false,
    "Medium High Intensity AX Conflict Zone": false,
    "Medium Intensity Conflict Zone": false,
    "Kampfbereich [Mittlere Intensität]": false,
    "Kampfbereich mittlerer Intensität": false,
    "Mission Target": true,
    "Missionsziel": true,
    "Nav Beacon": false,
    "Navigationsboje": false,
    "Non-Human Signal Source": true,
    "Nichtmenschliche Signalquelle": true,
    "Notable Stellar Phenomena": true,
    "Bemerkenswerte Sternenphänomene": true,
    "Pirate Activity": true,
    "Planetary Anomaly": true,
    "Power Convoy": true,
    "Konvoi der Macht": true,
    "Power Convoy Distress Signal": true,
    "Konvoi-Notrufsignal der Macht": true,
    "Power Wreckage Signature": true,
    "PowerWeaponsFire": true,
    "Power Weapons Fire Signature": true,
    "Macht-Waffenfeuer-Signatur": true,
    "PP-Waffenfeuer": true,
    "PowerEmissions": true,
    "Macht-Wrack-Signatur": true,
    "Wracksignaturen der Macht": true,
    "Resource Extraction Site": false,
    "Rohstoffabbaugebiet": false,
    "Trading Beacon": true,
    "Handelssignal": true,
    "Thargoiden Hauptstandort": true,
    "Unidentified Signal Source": false,
    "Unidentifizierte Signalquelle": true,
    "Unbekannte Signalquelle": false,
    "Unregistered Comms Beacon": true,
    "Unbekannte Kommunikationsboje": true,
    "Weapons Fire": true,
    "Waffenfeuer": true,
    "Gefährdungsnavigationssignal": true,
    "System Colonisation Ship": true,
    "Bojen-Einsatzort": true,
]}

{  if status.gui_focus = "fss mode" || status.gui_focus = "saa mode" && 
    (spokenSources[event.source] = true && event.unique = true ) :
    {if event.source && !event.stationsignal:
        {event.source}
        {if event.threatlevel > 0: der Klasse {event.threatlevel}}
        {if event.power :
            {if event.power = "None" || event.power = "Keine" :
            |else: {event.power}}
        }
         
        {if event.faction :
            {if event.faction = "None" || event.faction = "Keine" : 
            |else: für {event.faction}}
        }
        entdeckt.
        {if event.opposingpower :
            {if event.opposingpower = "None" || event.opposingpower = "Keine" :
            |else:
                {OneOf('in der Nähe gibt es auch Signale von {event.opposingpower}',
                'Ebenfalls Signale von {event.opposingpower} empfangen')}.
            }    
        }
    }
}

{_Test }
{_ if event.stationsignal: Typ event.signaltype, Quelle event.source, event.name }

{_
faction             - The faction originating the signal source, if any 
factionstate        - The faction state that triggered the signal source, if any 
opposingpower       - The powerplay power opposing the originating power, if any 
power               - The powerplay power originating the signal source, if any 
secondsremaining    - The time before the signal expires, in seconds 
signaltype          - The signal type 
source              - The signal source 
stationsignal       - True if the signal source is a station 
threatlevel         - The risk posed by the signal source. Higher numbers are more dangerous. 
unique              - True if this is the first signal of this type detected within the star system 
_}
Signal detected.defaultValue:
{_ Edit the true/false values of `spokenSources` to identify signal types that should be announced whenever they are first detected within a system (otherwise, only signal sources detected while in fss or saa mode will be taken into account. _}

{set spokenSources to [
    "Ancient Probe": true,
    "Anomaly": true,
    "Armed Revolt": true,
    "AX Conflict Zone": true,
    "Capitol Ship": false,
    "Ceremonial Comms": false,
    "Combat Aftermath": false,
    "Compromised Nav Beacon": true,
    "Convoy Beacon": false,
    "Convoy Dispersal Pattern": false,
    "Debris Field": false,
    "Degraded Emissions": false,
    "Distress Call": true,
    "Distribution Center": false,
    "Encoded Emissions": false,
    "Hazardous Resource Extraction Site": false,
    "High Grade Emissions": false,
    "High Intensity AX Conflict Zone": false,
    "High Intensity Conflict Zone": false,
    "High Intensity Resource Extraction Site": false,
    "Listening Post": true,
    "Low Intensity AX Conflict Zone": false,
    "Low Intensity Conflict Zone": false,
    "Low Intensity Resource Extraction Site": false,
    "Medium High Intensity AX Conflict Zone": false,
    "Medium Intensity Conflict Zone": false,
    "Mission Target": true,
    "Nav Beacon": false,
    "Non-Human Signal Source": false,
    "Notable Stellar Phenomena": true,
    "Pirate Activity": true,
    "Planetary Anomaly": true,
    "Power Convoy": true,
    "Power Convoy Distress Signal": true,
    "Power Wreckage Signature": true,
    "Power Weapons Fire Signature": true,
    "Resource Extraction Site": false,
    "Trading Beacon": false,
    "Unidentified Signal Source": false,
    "Unregistered Comms Beacon": true,
    "Weapons Fire": false,
]}

{if status.gui_focus = "fss mode" || 
    status.gui_focus = "saa mode" || 
    (spokenSources[event.source] = true && event.unique):
    {if event.source && !event.stationsignal:
        {if event.threatlevel > 0:
            Class {event.threatlevel} 
        }
        {if event.power && event.power != "None":
            {P(event.power, "power")}
        }
        {event.source} 
        {if event.faction && event.faction != "None":
            for {P(event.faction, "faction")}
        }
        detected.
        {if event.opposingpower && event.opposingpower != "None":
            {P(event.opposingpower, "power")} signals 
            {OneOf("detected", "are also present")} in the vicinity.
        }
    }
}

Squadron status.name: Squadron status
Squadron status.description: Triggered when your status with a squadron has changed
Squadron status.script:
{Log("EVENT: Squadron status")}

{_ Squadron status }
{_ Triggered when your status with a squadron changes }

{if event.status = "applied":
    Du hast den Beitritt zur Staffel {event.name} beantragt.
|elif event.status = "created":
    Du hast soeben die Staffel {event.name} gegründet.
|elif event.status = "disbanded":
    Die Staffel {event.name} wurde aufgelöst.
|elif event.status = "invited":
